column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My 24th anniversary dinner Choice and it was a fantastic experience . Top notch if your celebrating an special occasion this it ! Our server was Rich D he's phenomenal excellent at his craft of suggestions being patient and anticipating your needs . Â For our 1st ciurse we went with the arugula mixed green salad and apple salad which we split and he brought warm sourdough bread with oil and cheese. Next our drinks which was very strong by the way shout out to the bartender he had one Job and he did that ! Drinks were cosmopolitan and cucumber martini hubby choice
